title: 49 RP
body:
Hey, 

I need 49 RP to purchase a skin I want.... Is there a way of getting this RP instead of buying it?
I heard before that Riot would add the RP into your account if you were a couple points short of a skin... Can you still do that? And if so how? :D

Thanks =)

replies.body:
>a couple points

What is your definition of a couple?

49 is 2450% greater than 2. I don't think you'll just be given that amount of points.
a couple as in less than 100 lol

:P

I've never seen a red give out more than 3 points before.

Just sayin'.
